My name is Daniel, I am frontend developer. I finished my study on High School of Electrical Engineering in Pardubice. After trying out different IT jobs, I realised making front-end is what makes me happy and fulfills me. This site was created to show off my skills and also to say something about myself.

My journey

I started working right after graduation. At first I was doing customer support in Decathlon Pardubice. After almost two years of monotonous work I got bored of it and started looking for job in IT. Just in few weeks I found myself work in local company. I was setting up cameras on one purpose production lines, to recognize poorly made product. Eventually I was forced to leave due to big portion of travelling, required on this position. My next and to this day last job was EDI specialist. I was basically setting up everything for correct comunication between supplier and chain of stores in Czech republic.

My projects

Bydza beardies

This project was created to present future ofsprings from our bearded dragons. Technologies used : React js, css, js

Create terra

(WIP) Website created to help other people with creating and vizualizing terrarium ideas. Technologies used : React js, css, js

Homemade alexa

My disk died while ago together with this project and many more. Technologies used : Raspberry PI, python
